document.full_text: despite the ongoing labor dispute with players, the nfl still plans on a 16-game schedule and a super bowl in indianapolis although commissioner roger goodell said the league would be prepared for anything.
document.title: goodell says nfl busy preparing contingency plans
lines_and_colors: despite the ongoing labor dispute with players, the nfl still plans on a 16-game schedule and a super bowl in indianapolis although commissioner roger goodell said the league would be prepared for anything.
